About Me

Here's a bit about me...

BIO

My name is Justin Nappi, I started teaching myself development and design when I was twelve and now I am studying computer science at the University of Connecticutâ€™s School of Engineering. In addition to my passion for development and design, I am an entrepreneur and a self-proclaimed video game enthusiast.

My latest venture is a startup called SmartCards. Myself and two other UConn students saw the opportunity to utilize augmented reality to create a more interactive and engaging way to learn. We were focused on creating a more inclusive solution, especially for students with neurodiversities. SmartCards will use mobile augmented reality, combined with computer vision in order to allow students to utilize hand gestures and hand tracking to interact with their learning like never before.

Overall, if I had to put my goal into one sentence, it would be: I want to utilize my passion for technology to create a more inclusive and fun world for everyone. As broad as that goal may be, it is what motivates me to continue developing my skills every day.

I have experience using Git, Python, C#, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and SCSS. I am also trained in Windows 10 and ChromeOS. More recently I have began learning blockchain programming as well as machine learning.

Full Resume

Oxford Public Schools

Network Specialist Assistant (Sep 2018 - Jul 2020)

Hardware and software servicing for Windows 10 and ChromeOS devices. Update district website. Respond to tickets and work with others to teach them about their devices. Basic understanding of networks

Stamford Startup Studio

Production Manager (Sep 2021 - Present)

As a cooperative education student at the Stamford Startup Studio I have been developing skills in product managemnt, customer discovery, and development. I work with consultants and companies in the real estate and construction industry as well as with the other members of the cohort to identify problems in the industry and utilize emerging technology in order to create innovative solutions.
